text:
As coronavirus ravages our communities and millions go jobless, Senate Republicans want to spend $740 billion on bombs and missiles.

Dr. King warned that a society with these priorities is approaching spiritual death. It's time to cut the Pentagon budget. https://t.co/46NlhMfvr7
